mainMeta.title: Dialogue and Civil Peace Center - Charity Organization
mainMeta.description: A charitable platform dedicated to promoting dialogue and civil peace in Syria, supporting humanitarian and development projects that strengthen community cooperation and solidarity.

services.subtitle: Charity Services
services.title:
We Do It For All People
Humanist Services

openDoor.title: Our Door Are Always Open To More People Who Want To Support Each Others!
openDoor.openDescription: Our community welcomes everyone with open arms and endless opportunities
openDoor.peopleDescription: Join our growing family of passionate individuals making a difference
openDoor.supportDescription: Together we grow stronger through mutual support and collaboration

helpSection.title: We Always Help The Needy People
helpSection.description: Discover the inspiring stories of individuals and communities transformed by our programs. Our success stories highlight the real-life impact of your donations.

donation.description: Our secure online donation platform allows you to make contributions quickly and safely. Choose from various payment methods.

footer.tagline: Making a difference through secure and transparent donations.

heroProjects.title: Our Projects
heroProjects.subtitle: Building peace and community through sustainable humanitarian initiatives

aboutProjects.title: About Our Projects
aboutProjects.description: The Center for Dialogue and Civil Peace is committed to supporting sustainable humanitarian projects that create lasting positive change in our communities. Through education, community development, and peacebuilding initiatives, we work together to foster dialogue, understanding, and mutual respect among all people.
aboutProjects.peaceDesc: Creating spaces for dialogue and understanding

categories.title: Project Categories
categories.educationDesc: Programs focused on quality education and skill development for all ages
categories.communityDesc: Initiatives that strengthen community bonds and local economies
categories.peacebuildingDesc: Dialogue programs and conflict resolution initiatives
categories.healthDesc: Healthcare access and wellness programs for underserved populations
categories.environmentDesc: Sustainable environmental conservation and climate action projects

cta.title: Join Us in Making a Difference
cta.description: Your support helps us continue our mission of building peace and fostering dialogue. Whether through volunteering, donations, or spreading awareness, every contribution matters.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message!

contact.haveQuestionsDesc: We're here to help. Reach out to us anytime.

donation.description: Every donation brings clean water closer to those in need
